Class ADynamicEqualizer

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.audiofilters.AudioFilter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.audiofilters.adynamicequalizer.ADynamicEqualizer
public class ADynamicEqualizer extends AudioFilter
This class implements FFmpeg's "adynamicequalizer" filter.
